thread.title: Feud heats up over chip cards, FBI warning
thread.title_full: Feud heats up over chip cards, FBI warning

title: Feud heats up over chip cards, FBI warning
text:
15 Feud heats up over chip cards, FBI warning 
CIO: A National Retail Federation attorney said Wednesday that an updated FBI warning on chip card vulnerabilities waters down the need for PIN security.Don't count on your 'plain vanilla' resume to get you noticed - your resume needs a personal flavor toRead NowThe FBI on Friday posted a revised warning about vulnerabilities with new chip-embedded credit cards that deletes language about the need to use PIN security, which had appeared in the FBI's original version last week.
